item.description:
It's a "2fer". After enjoying our bi-monthly brunch (a choice of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea and a sweet ala Julia Child...in an authentic Parisian atmosphere...all for $9.95 (plus tax and tip)), we can traipse over to the SOWA (South of Washington) markets and enjoy the smells and sights of fresh veggies, exotic concoctions, and creative crafts and novelties.

 

Oh, and yes there is still FREE parking!

Guests are responsible for their own bill, Paypal is NOT accepted for this event.
item.why: It's a "2fer" Brunch and the SOWA market!
item.name: Sunday Brunch at the Gaslight and a visit to SOWA!
